text: Arto Savolainen (born 3 February 1941) is a Finnish wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle lightweight at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Finland Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Oulu
title: Arto Savolainen
